# HUD::THEFEED_REMOVE_ITEM

## Summary
Removed an item from the feed.

## Parameters
* **INT** id:
The id of the item to removed.
( This id is returned from all END_TEXT_COMMAND_THEFEED_POST_commands )

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Removes a notification instantly instead of waiting for it to disappear
